name: Nite Ize SlapLitLED Drink Wrap
description: Campfire fun is just a slap away. This neoprene drink wrap adds a layer of insulation to keep your drink cooler and your hand warmer. The coloured LED strip can be set to solid or flashing to easily identify which drink is yours.Neoprene wrap with spring steel bands has a non-slip back to hold drinks securely.Coloured LED strip lights the entire length of the wrap.Glow or flash option for easy drink identification.Replaceable CR2032 battery included for 100 hours of light.
